description.plain:
Zendaya Coleman (born September 1, 1996) came to fame as one of the leads of Disney Channel show, Shake It Up. She quickly capitalized on the new found relevance by releasing largely successful music and going on Dancing With The Stars. She then went on both starring in and producing the hit Disney show K.C Undercover.

As an actress, Coleman has played played Michelle (MJ) in the Spider-Man franchise, Anne Wheeler in The Greatest Showman, and Rue in Euphoria, among other roles.

She quickly capitalized on the new found relevance by releasing largely successful music and going on Dancing With The Stars. As an actress, Coleman has played played Michelle (MJ) in the Spider-Man franchise, Anne Wheeler in The Greatest Showman, and Rue in Euphoria, among other roles.

songs.title: Replay

description.plain:
“Replay” is a glitch-influenced pop song where Zendaya compares her love to a song she loves playing repeatedly.

This song is the lead single from Zendaya’s self-titled debut.

songs.embed_content: Read “Replay” by Zendaya on Genius

songs.title: Neverland

description.plain:
Neverland is the first single taken from the compilation album, Finding Neverland. This specific version was first heard on The 68th Annual Tony Awards, performed by R&B vocalist, Jennifer Hudson.

The music video was released on January 24, 2016:

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=O3VPs9b_HZE

songs.embed_content: Read “Neverland” by Zendaya on Genius

songs.full_title: Neverland by Matthew Morrison (Ft. Laura Michelle Kelly)
songs.title: Neverland

songs.lyrics:
21 ContributorsNeverland Lyrics[Verse 1]
Whenever I was frightened or ever felt alone
I turned to the night sky at a star I call my own
Somewhere I could run to, just across the Milky Way
If you like, I could take you
It's just a lightyear and a day

[Chorus]
We can sail away tonight on a sea of pure moonlight
We can navigate the stars to bring us back home
In a place so far away
We'll be young, that's how we'll stay
Every wish is our command
When we find ourselves in Never, Neverland

[Verse 2]
Through all my make believe, there's some reality
In your reflection there's much more than you see, yeah!
All that you hope for, you hope for today
It's the love someone gives you in an unconditional way

[Chorus]
We can sail away tonight on a sea of pure moonlight
We can navigate the stars to bring us back home
In a place so far away
We'll be young, that's how we'll stay
Every wish is our command
When we find ourselves in Never, Neverland
You might also like[Bridge]
Picture a land you'll never have seen
Where life is eternal and evergreen
Future of happiness all in your hands
All in this place I created that I call Neverland

[Chorus 2]
We can sail away tonight on a sea of pure moonlight
We can navigate the stars to bring us back home
In a place so far away
We'll be young, that's how we'll stay
And with your hand in my hand
I am closer now to finding Neverland
And with your hand in my hand
I am closer now to finding Neverland7Embed

songs.full_title: Something New by Zendaya (Ft. Chris Brown)
songs.title: Something New

description.plain:
On “Something New,” Zendaya sings about meeting someone at a club and wanting to have a one-night stand.

“Something New” is the lead radio single off Zendaya’s sophomore album. The song shifts from her electro-pop sound established on “Replay” to a more contemporary R&B sound.

Zendaya told MTV News:

I would say it’s the new wave of R&B. It’s where I think it should be going, or it should be headed; it’s very old-school vibe, but it’s a new age version.

songs.embed_content: Read “Something New” by Zendaya on Genius
